tgt_original: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandika ityādi |  tatrādhikārārthapratipattyā gatimān |  tāvanmātrārthāvagamānmatimāna |  medhāyogāt smṛtimān |

deśāntaraṃ kṣepsyata ityanena śrotuśchandaviṣayāddaiśikasya bhinnacchandaviṣayatvamāveditam |  rūpamityādyukte rūpādiskandhāparijñānānnodghaṭitajñaḥ |  dharmadaiśikaśrāvaṇikayordātukāmadeśāntaragantukāmatvena bhinnaviṣayachandatvāt |
